content: One of our TNR (trap-neuter-release) volunteers caught her 100th cat! Why is TNR so important?
One of our kittens, Bananas went to a loving home. We know she will have lots of fun playing with her new human 'sibling' Matt (10 yrs) and Sarah (6 yrs)!

We've brought on a new volunteer! Martha is from Riverside, NJ. Besides loving to spend time with her cats, she also enjoys sewing and spending time with her grandkids. Welcome Martha, we're happy to have you!
Spring is right around the corner which means one thing for us at Cat's Meow - kitten season! If you are feeding any kittens, please reach out so we can help trap.
